text: Randy Frese is a Republican member of the Illinois House of Representatives who represents the 94th district. The 94th district, located in Western Illinois along the Mississippi River, includes all or parts of Adams, Henderson, Hancock and Warren counties.http://elections.il.gov/Downloads/VotingInformation/PDF/2011Districts/2011RepDist94.pdf He succeeded Jil Tracy, who chose not to run for re-election to be Kirk Dillard's running mate in the 2014 gubernatorial election.Kirk Dillard announces Quincy-area lawmaker Jil Tracy as running mate, Chris Kaergard, Peoria Journal Star, September 3, 2013 Prior to being elected to the Illinois House of Representatives, he served as the Adams County Circuit Clerk from 2004 until 2012 when he opted to run against John M. Sullivan for State Senate instead of running for re-election. ==References== ==External links== *Illinois General Assembly Profile Category:Living people Category:People from Adams County, Illinois Category:Illinois Republicans Category:Members of the Illinois House of Representatives Category:Western Illinois University alumni Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:21st-century American politicians
title: Randy Frese
